text:
@realDonaldTrump @Twitter Typical Trump Administration pandering to the big donors at the expense of the little guys.  But his #LittleRedHattedTrumpettes just ignore it, keep their eyes glued to @FOXNews and assume he’s looking out for them. Sad. 

https://t.co/d2mECwsgfa
